name: Fist Puncher
description: Return to the glory days of sidescrolling beat-em-ups, courtesy of developers Team2Bit and Adult Swim Games. The sinister Milkman holds the city of San Cruces in his nasty criminal grip, and it’s up to legendary black belt neurosurgeon Dr. Karate and the rest of the Fist Puncher team to deliver old-school justice to the lawless streets.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows XP (SP2)      Memory:2 GB RAM Graphics:Direct X 9       DirectX®:9.0 Hard Drive:500 MB HD space Additional:Xbox Controller Recommended
recommended_requirements: Memory:4 GB RAM DirectX®:10 Hard Drive:500 MB HD space Additional:Xbox Controller Recommended
